summary: Initializes the Prefect package, re‑exports core classes and utilities, and implements an import interceptor that redirects legacy Prefect 1 imports to compatible modules, ensuring seamless backward compatibility.
business_intent: Provide a single entry point for the Prefect workflow orchestration platform while preserving compatibility with older Prefect 1 codebases, allowing users to access flows, tasks, deployments, infrastructure, client APIs, and runtime utilities through a unified namespace.
